itemDescription: virologist at the Francis Crick Institute

wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Paul Stoye (born 1952)  is a virologist at the Francis Crick Institute in London, England. He has made substantial contributions to scientific understanding of the interactions of retroviruses with their hosts.
